title: Classification of real and imaginary modules of quantum affine algebras in monoidal categorifications of affine cluster algebras
summary: Recently, Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park introduced a wide family of monoidal categories of finite-dimensional representations of quantum affine algebras, which provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras. In this paper, we prove that, for types $ADE$, some of these categories provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras of affine type. Moreover, by means of the combinatorial theory of affine type cluster algebras, we give a complete classification of real and imaginary simple modules in these categories. In particular, we show that, in these cases, the conjecture asserting that real simple modules correspond exactly to cluster monomials holds.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于ADE类型的量子仿射代数，某些有限维表示范畴提供了仿射型簇代数的单子范畴化，并完全分类了这些范畴中的实和虚单模。
AI.motivation: Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park最近引入了一类量子仿射代数有限维表示的宽泛单子范畴，这些范畴提供了簇代数的单子范畴化。本文旨在研究这些范畴在ADE类型下与仿射型簇代数的关系，并验证关于实单模与簇单项式对应关系的猜想。
AI.method: 利用仿射型簇代数的组合理论，对ADE类型量子仿射代数的特定有限维表示范畴进行分析。通过组合方法对这些范畴中的实和虚单模进行完全分类。
AI.result: 证明了对于ADE类型，这些范畴确实提供了仿射型簇代数的单子范畴化。完全分类了这些范畴中的实和虚单模，并验证了实单模恰好对应簇单项式的猜想在这些情况下成立。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了量子仿射代数表示范畴与仿射型簇代数之间的深刻联系，验证了重要的表示论猜想，并为理解这些范畴的模结构提供了完整的组合分类。

title: Weyl-Type and Witt-Type Algebras with Exponential Generators:Structure, Automorphisms, and Representation Theory
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies a new class of non-commutative algebras -- Weyl-type and Witt-type algebras -- generated by differential operators with exponential and generalized power function coefficients. We define the expolynomial ring $R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = \mathbb{F}\bigl[ e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\mathcal{A} x},\; x^{\mathcal{A}} \bigr]$ associated to an additive subgroup $\mathcal{A} \subset \mathbb{F}$, and investigate its Ore extension $A_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}[\partial; δ]$ (Weyl-type) and its derivation algebra $\mathfrak{g}_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = \operatorname{Der}_{\mathbb{F}}(R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}})$ (Witt-type). Our main results establish: (1) the automorphism group of $R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}$ is isomorphic to $(\mathbb{F}^{\times})^{2r+1} \rtimes \operatorname{GL}(2r+1,\mathbb{Z})$; (2) a Galois descent theorem showing that fixed-point subalgebras under finite Galois actions recover the original Weyl-type algebra; (3) the non-existence of finite-dimensional simple modules for $A_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}$; (4) the Zariski density of isomorphism classes in moduli spaces as transcendental parameters vary; (5) the stability of simplicity under generic quantum deformation; and (6) a complete representation-theoretic framework including the classification of irreducible weight modules, the construction of Harish--Chandra modules with BGG-type resolutions, and the structure of category $\mathcal{O}$. These results unify and extend classical theories of Weyl algebras, Witt algebras, and generalized Weyl algebras, while opening new directions in deformation theory, non-commutative geometry, and the representation theory of infinite-dimensional algebras.

AI.tldr: 本文系统研究了一类新的非交换代数——Weyl型和Witt型代数，这些代数由具有指数和广义幂函数系数的微分算子生成。论文建立了完整的代数结构、自同构群、表示理论框架，并证明了多个重要结果。
AI.motivation: 为了统一和扩展经典的Weyl代数、Witt代数和广义Weyl代数理论，同时为变形理论、非交换几何和无限维代数的表示理论开辟新方向，作者引入了这类新的非交换代数。
AI.method: 定义了expolynomial环R_{p,t,𝒜} = 𝔽[e^{±x^p e^t}, e^{𝒜x}, x^{𝒜}]及其Ore扩张A_{p,t,𝒜} = R_{p,t,𝒜}[∂; δ]（Weyl型）和导子代数𝔤_{p,t,𝒜} = Der_𝔽(R_{p,t,𝒜})（Witt型）。采用代数结构分析、Galois下降、表示理论等方法进行研究。
AI.result: 主要结果包括：(1) R_{p,t,𝒜}的自同构群同构于(𝔽^×)^{2r+1} ⋊ GL(2r+1,ℤ)；(2) Galois下降定理；(3) A_{p,t,𝒜}不存在有限维单模；(4) 模空间中等价类的Zariski稠密性；(5) 一般量子变形下的单性稳定性；(6) 完整的表示理论框架，包括不可约权模分类、具有BGG型分解的Harish-Chandra模构造、范畴𝒪的结构等。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果统一并扩展了经典代数理论，为变形理论、非交换几何和无限维代数表示理论开辟了新方向，建立了系统完整的理论框架。

title: Multiparameter quantum general linear supergroup
comment: 36 pages - Keywords: Quantum Groups, Quantum Function Algebras - N.B.: in the present version, PBW theorems were added: this affects secc. 3.1, 3.2, 4.2 and 4.3, and it makes the paper five pages longer
summary: We introduce uniparametric and multiparametric quantisations of the general linear supergroup, in the form of "quantised function algebras", both in a formal setting - yielding "quantum formal series Hopf superalgebras", a` la Drinfeld - and in a polynomial one - closer to Manin's point of view. In the uniparametric setting, we start from quantised universal enveloping superalgebras over gl(n) - endowed with a super-structure - as in [Ya1] and [Zha]: through a direct approach, we construct their linear dual, thus finding the quantum formal series Hopf superalgebras mentioned above, which are described in detail via an explicit presentation. Starting from the latter, then, we perform a deformation by a well-chosen 2-cocycle, thus getting a multiparametric quantisation, described again by an explicit presentation: this is, in turn, the dual to the multiparametric quantised universal enveloping algebra over gl(n) from [GGP]. We also provide some "polynomial versions" of these quantisations, both for the uniparametric and the multiparametric case. In particular, we compare the latter to Manin's quantum function algebras from [Ma]. Finally, both for the uniparametric and the multiparametric setting, we provide suitable PBW-like theorems, in "formal" and in "polynomial" versions alike.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了广义线性超群的单参数和多参数量子化，构建了量子形式级数Hopf超代数和多项式版本，建立了与量子包络超代数的对偶关系，并给出了PBW型定理。
AI.motivation: 研究广义线性超群的量子化，特别是构建单参数和多参数量子化版本，探索量子形式级数Hopf超代数和多项式量子函数代数，建立与现有量子包络超代数的对偶关系。
AI.method: 1. 从具有超结构的量子包络超代数出发，通过直接方法构造其对偶，得到量子形式级数Hopf超代数；2. 通过精心选择的2-上循环进行形变，获得多参数量子化；3. 提供单参数和多参数情况下的多项式版本；4. 建立PBW型定理的形式和多项式版本。
AI.result: 成功构建了广义线性超群的单参数和多参数量子化，给出了量子形式级数Hopf超代数和多项式量子函数代数的显式表示，建立了与现有量子包络超代数的对偶关系，并证明了相应的PBW型定理。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统性地发展了广义线性超群的量子化理论，提供了从单参数到多参数、从形式级数到多项式版本的完整框架，建立了与Drinfeld和Manin方法的联系，为超对称量子群理论提供了新的工具和结果。

title: A note on TQFTs for orientable 2-dimensional cobordisms
comment: 5 pages, comments welcome. v2: references updated
summary: Topological quantum field theories (TQFTs) are symmetric monoidal functors out of cobordism categories. In dimension two, oriented TQFTs are famously classified by commutative Frobenius algebras. In the unoriented setting, the classification requires additional data: an involution and a value assigned to the Möbius strip. In this work, we describe an intermediate framework that classifies 2-dimensional TQFTs for orientable cobordisms, in an appropriate sense. Our motivation arises from skein-theoretic models of surfaces embedded in 3-manifolds and Khovanov homology, where surfaces are often treated as unoriented, even though the associated 2-dimensional TQFTs themselves need not be fully unoriented.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个中间框架，用于分类二维拓扑量子场论在可定向配边范畴中的情况，介于完全定向和完全非定向TQFT之间。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于结理论中的曲面嵌入3-流形模型和Khovanov同调，其中曲面通常被视为非定向的，但相关的二维TQFT本身并不需要完全非定向。
AI.method: 建立了一个中间框架，用于分类二维TQFT在可定向配边范畴中的情况，介于完全定向TQFT（由交换Frobenius代数分类）和完全非定向TQFT（需要额外数据：对合和Möbius带的值）之间。
AI.result: 描述了一个分类框架，能够处理那些曲面被视为非定向但TQFT本身不需要完全非定向的情况，为结理论和Khovanov同调中的几何结构提供了更精确的数学描述。
AI.conclusion: 该工作填补了二维TQFT分类理论中的一个空白，为处理可定向配边范畴中的TQFT提供了一个中间分类框架，这对于理解结理论和Khovanov同调中的几何结构具有重要意义。
